author: rajith
msg: Added a temp hack to get the testReplyToWithNamelessExchange passing with the java.0.10 test profile.
In doing so I realized that "qpid.declare_exchanges" has no affect on the producer side.
Therefore I added a check in BasicMessageProducer_0_10.java to check this flag before issuing an exchange_declare.

author: eevans
msg: AT.fromString() should return empty BB for empty String
Patch by eevans; reviewed by gdusbabek for CASSANDRA-2352
